changes_reviewed.change: Added 30-second timeout to prevent indefinite hangs
changes_reviewed.notes: This addresses the critical issue of git commands potentially hanging indefinitely. Good choice of timeout duration.

changes_reviewed.change: Separated stdout and stderr pipes for better error handling
changes_reviewed.notes: This provides better error isolation and makes debugging easier. Great improvement.

changes_reviewed.change: Added 3 comprehensive unit tests for GitManager
changes_reviewed.notes: Unit tests are crucial for maintaining code quality. Great addition.

feedback.collaboration_notes: This demonstrates excellent collaboration between AIs. OverseerAI provided suggestions, CoderAI implemented them, and the result is improved code quality with comprehensive test coverage.
